00013     void G4TrackerHit::Draw() {
00014 
00015         G4VVisManager* visManager = G4VVisManager::GetConcreteInstance();
00016 
00017         if (visManager) {
00018 
00019             G4Point3D p3D = G4Point3D(this->position_);
00020             G4Circle chit(p3D);
00021             chit.SetScreenDiameter(3.0);
00022             chit.SetFillStyle(G4Circle::filled);
00023 
00024             G4Colour col(1.0, 0.0, 1.0);
00025 
00026             chit.SetVisAttributes(G4VisAttributes(col));
00027             visManager->Draw(chit);
00028         }
00029     }

00032         print(std::cout);
00033     }

00035     std::ostream& G4TrackerHit::print(std::ostream& os) {
00036         os << "G4TrackerHit { " "edep: " << this->edep_
00037                 << ", " "position: (" << this->position_[0] << ", " << this->position_[1] << ", " << this->position_[2] << "), "
00038                 <<  "layerID: " << this->layerID_ << ", "
00039                 << "momentum: (" << this->momentum_[0] << ", " << this->momentum_[1] << ", " << this->momentum_[2] << "), "
00040                 << "pathLength: " << this->pathLength_ << ", " << "time: " << this->time_ << " }" << std::endl;
00041         return os;
00042     }
